message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with background estimation in surveillance videos, which is a common problem in computer vision and image processing. The use of Markov Random Fields and iterated conditional modes suggests that the paper belongs to the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.MM) sub-categories. The low computational and memory requirements suggest that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the use of frequency response and spatial continuity suggests that the paper may also belong to the information theory (cs.IT) sub-category.
